00030     static bool comparePosStart(const _BASE_ &item, const int & value)
00031     {
00032         return item.getStart() < value;
00033     }
00034     static bool compareStart(const _BASE_ &item1, const _BASE_ &item2)
00035     {
00036         return item1.getStart() < item2.getStart();
00037     }
00038     static bool compareLenght(const _BASE_ &item1, const _BASE_ &item2)
00039     {
00040         return item1.getLenght() < item2.getLenght();
00041     }
00042     static bool comparePos(const _BASE_ &item1, const _BASE_ &item2)
00043     {
00044         if ((item1.getStart() != item2.getStart()))
00045             return item1.getStart() < item2.getStart();
00046         else
00047             return item1.getEnd() < item2.getEnd();
00048     }

00183     void removeSpecificSites(UnaryPredicate pred){
00184     try
00185         {
00186         for(auto& x : ExpMap)
00187             {
00188                 x.second.removeSpecificSites(pred);

00192         {
00193             #ifdef DEBUG
00194             std::cerr << "Failed in divideItemsIntoBinofSize"<<std::endl;

00213     template<class BinaryOperation, class InitialValue>
00214     InitialValue accumulateChromsInfo(BinaryOperation binary_op, InitialValue init) const
00215     {
00216         // Force using sequential version for accumulate as parallel version
00217         // doesn't work if actual data type of InitialValue and _CHROM_ cannot be
00218         // converted back and forth.
00219         return __gnu_parallel::accumulate(std::begin(ExpMap), std::end(ExpMap), init,
00220                                           [&binary_op, &init] (decltype(init) partial, NGSExpPair element)
00221                                           -> decltype(binary_op(partial, element.second))
00222         {
00223             return binary_op(partial, element.second);
00224         }, __gnu_parallel::sequential_tag());
00225     }
00226 
00239     template<class UnaryOperation>
00240     auto computeOnAllChroms(UnaryOperation unary_op) const -> std::map<std::string, decltype(unary_op(_CHROM_()))>
00241     {
00242         std::map<std::string, decltype(unary_op(_CHROM_()))> results;
00243         transform(std::begin(ExpMap), std::end(ExpMap), std::inserter(results, begin(results)), [&unary_op](NGSExpPair element)
00244         {
00245             return make_pair(element.first, unary_op(element.second));
00246         });
00247         return results;
00248     }
00249 
00262     template<class UnaryOperation>
00263     auto computeOnOneChrom(UnaryOperation unary_op, const std::string & chr) const -> std::map<std::string, decltype(unary_op(_CHROM_()))>
00264     {
00265         std::map<std::string, decltype(unary_op(_CHROM_()))> results;
00266        if (ExpMap.count(chr)){
00267             transform(std::begin(ExpMap), std::end(ExpMap), std::inserter(results, begin(results)), [&unary_op](NGSExpPair element)
00268             {
00269                 return make_pair(element.first, unary_op(element.second));
00270             });
00271         }
00272         return results;
00273     }

00287     template<class UnaryPredicate>
00288     auto getSpecificChroms(UnaryPredicate pred) const->decltype(ExpMap)
00289    // NGSExpMap getSpecificChroms(UnaryPredicate pred) const
00290     {
00291 //         auto begin()->decltype(ExpMap.begin()){return ExpMap.begin();};
00292 
00293        // NGSExpMap copyColl;
00294         decltype(ExpMap) copyColl;
00295         copy_if(std::begin(ExpMap), std::end(ExpMap), std::inserter(copyColl, std::begin(copyColl)), [&pred]( const typename decltype(ExpMap)::value_type& element)
00296         {
00297             return pred(element.second);
00298         });
00299         return copyColl;
00300     }

00315     template<class UnaryFunction>
00316     UnaryFunction applyOnAllChroms(UnaryFunction f)
00317     {
00318         for_each(std::begin(ExpMap), std::end(ExpMap), [&f](NGSExpPair& element)
00319         {
00320             f(element.second);
00321         });
00322         return f;
00323     }

00338     template<class UnaryFunction>
00339     UnaryFunction applyOnOneChrom(UnaryFunction f, const std::string & chr)
00340     {
00341         if (ExpMap.count(chr)){
00342             auto & elem = ExpMap[chr];
00343             f(elem);}
00344         return f;

00384     UnaryFunction applyOnSites(UnaryFunction f)
00385     {
00386         for_each(std::begin(ExpMap), std::end(ExpMap), [&f](NGSExpPair& element)

00397         {
00398             element.second.applyOnAllSites(f);
00399             //f(element.second);
00400         });
00401         return f;

00508 template<typename _CHROM_, typename _BASE_>
00509 void uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_, _BASE_>::addSite(const _BASE_ & newSite)
00510 {
00511 
00512     try {
00513     _CHROM_* ptempChrom;
00514 
00515     ptempChrom=&(ExpMap[newSite.getChr()]);
00516     ptempChrom->setChr(newSite.getChr());
00517     ptempChrom->addSite(newSite);
00518     }
00519     catch(std::exception & e)
00520     {
00521           #ifdef DEBUG
00522           std::cerr << "Catching and re-throwing in uFormatExp::addSite()" <<std::endl;
00523           #endif
00524         throw e;
00525     }
00526 }

00542 template<typename _CHROM_, typename _BASE_>
00543 void uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_, _BASE_>::removeSite(std::string chr, int position)
00544 {
00545     _CHROM_* tempChrom;
00546     tempChrom=&(ExpMap[chr]);
00547     try
00548     {
00549         if (position>=tempChrom.count())
00550         {
00551 
00552             abort();
00553         }
00554         tempChrom.removeSite(position);
00555 
00556     }
00557     catch(...)
00558     {
00559         std::cerr << "Crashing in removeSite() in uGenericNGSEXperiment,";
00560         throw;
00561     }
00562 }

00570 template<typename _CHROM_, typename _BASE_>
00571  void uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_, _BASE_>::loadFromTabFile(std::ifstream& stream)
00572 {
00573     std::string tempString;
00574     while(!std::getline(stream, tempString).eof())
00575     {
00576        addSite( static_cast<_BASE_>(factory::makeNGSfromTabString(tempString)));
00577     }
00578 }

00586 template<typename _CHROM_, typename _BASE_>
00587  void uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_, _BASE_>::loadWithParser(std::ifstream& pStream, std::string pType)
00588 {
00589     try {
00590     std::istream& refStream = pStream;
00591     uParser Curparser(&refStream, pType);
00592     while(!Curparser.eof()){
00593         addSite(Curparser.getNextEntry());
00594         }
00595     }
00596     catch(...)
00597     { throw; }
00598 }

00600 template<typename _CHROM_, typename _BASE_>
00601 void uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_, _BASE_>::loadWithParser(std::string filepath, std::string pType)
00602 {
00603     uParser ourParser(filepath, pType);
00604    // auto chrList=ourParser.getHeaderParamVector(header_param::CHR);
00605    // auto chrSizes=ourParser.getHeaderParamVector(header_param::CHR_SIZE);
00606 try {
00607 //        std::cerr << "name and size are :" <<chrList.at(i) <<" "<<chrSizes.at(i)<<std::endl;
00608    // for (int i=0; i<(int)chrList.size();i++){
00609    //     this->setChromSize(chrList.at(i), std::stoi(chrSizes.at(i)));
00610    // }
00611 
00612     while (ourParser.eof()==false){
00613         auto Token =ourParser.getNextEntry();
00614         this->addSite((Token));
00615     }
00616 }
00617 catch (...)
00618     {
00619         throw;
00620     }
00621     inferChrSize();
00622 
00623 }

00645 long long uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_, _BASE_>::count() const
00646 {
00647     return accumulateChromsInfo([](long long partialSum, _CHROM_ chrom) {return partialSum + chrom.count();}, 0LL);

00659 template<typename _CHROM_, typename _BASE_>
00660 int uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_>::getSubsetCount(const std::string & chr, const float start, const float end, OverlapType overlap)
00661 {
00662     int count=0;
00663     typename NGSExpMap::iterator iterMap;
00664     _CHROM_* tempChrom;
00665 
00666     tempChrom=&(ExpMap[chr]);
00667     count = tempChrom->getSubsetCount(start,
00668                                       end,
00669                                       overlap);
00670     return count;
00671 }

00691 template<typename _CHROM_, typename _BASE_>
00692 void uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_, _BASE_>::sortSites()
00693 {
00694    sortSites(uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_, _BASE_>::compareStart,&_BASE_::getStart,&_BASE_::getEnd);

00703 template<typename _CHROM_, typename _BASE_>
00704 template<typename Compare>
00705 void uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_, _BASE_>::sortSites(Compare comp,std::function<float(const _BASE_*)> getStart_funct,std::function<float(const _BASE_*)> getEnd_funct)
00706 {
00707     try
00708     {
00709         sortGetStart=getStart_funct;
00710         sortGetEnd= getEnd_funct;
00711         m_comptFunc=comp;
00713         auto sortfunct=std::bind( (void(_CHROM_::*)(Compare,std::function<float(const _BASE_*)>,std::function<float(const _BASE_*)>))
00714                                  &_CHROM_::sortSites,std::placeholders::_1, comp,getStart_funct,getEnd_funct);
00715         applyOnAllChroms(sortfunct );
00716        // return std::sort(std::begin(VecSites), std::end(VecSites), comp);
00717     }
00718     catch(std::exception &e)
00719     {
00720         throw e;
00721     }
00722 }

00725 template<typename _CHROM_, typename _BASE_>
00730 bool uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_, _BASE_>::isSorted()const{
00731         bool sorted=true;
00732         applyOnAllChroms([&](_CHROM_& chrom){
00733                          if (chrom.isSorted(m_comptFunc)==false)
00734                          sorted=false;
00735                          });
00736 
00737     return sorted;
00738 }

00744             std::cerr << it->second.getChr() << " is sorted  " <<   it->second.getSortedStatus() <<std::endl;
00745     }

00756 template<typename _CHROM_, typename _BASE_>
00757 typename std::vector<_BASE_>::const_iterator uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_>::findPrecedingSite(std::string chr, int position)const
00758 {
00759     typename NGSExpMap::iterator iterMap;
00760     _CHROM_* tempChrom;
00761     if (ExpMap.count(chr))
00762         {
00763             tempChrom=&(ExpMap[chr]);
00764              return tempChrom->findPrecedingSite(position);
00765         }
00766 return nullptr;
00767 }

00775             tempChrom=&(ExpMap[chr]);

00825  template<typename _CHROM_, typename _BASE_>
00826 _CHROM_ uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_>::getSubset(std::string chr, float start, float end, OverlapType options)
00827 {
00828    if (ExpMap.count(chr)==0)
00829       return _CHROM_();
00830 
00831     return (_CHROM_)ExpMap[chr].getSubset(start,end,options);
00832 }

00843  template<typename _CHROM_, typename _BASE_>
00844 uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_> uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_>::getDistinct(uGenericNGSExperiment &compareExp, OverlapType options)
00845 {
00846     typename NGSExpMap::iterator iterMap;
00847     _CHROM_* pChrom;
00848     uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_> returnExp;
00849     for (iterMap = ExpMap.begin(); iterMap != ExpMap.end(); iterMap++)
00850     {
00851         pChrom = compareExp.getpChrom(iterMap->first);
00852         returnExp.combine(iterMap->second.getDistinct((uGenericNGSExperiment)compareExp));
00853     }
00854     return returnExp;
00855 }
00856 
00857 template<typename _CHROM_, typename _BASE_>
00858 uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_> uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_>::getDistinct(_CHROM_ &compareChr, OverlapType options)
00859 {
00860 
00861     _CHROM_* pChrom;
00862     uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_> returnExp;
00863     if (ExpMap.count(compareChr.getChr()) ){
00864         _CHROM_* tempChrom=&(ExpMap[compareChr.getChr()]);
00865         returnExp.combine(tempChrom->getDistinct(compareChr));
00866         }
00867     return returnExp;
00868 }
00869 
00870 template<typename _CHROM_, typename _BASE_>
00871 uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_> uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_>::getDistinct(_BASE_ elem,  OverlapType options)
00872 {
00873     typename NGSExpMap::iterator iterMap;
00874     uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_> returnExp;
00875     _CHROM_* tempChrom=&(ExpMap[elem.getChr()]);
00876 
00877     return getDistinct(elem.getChr(),elem.getStart(),elem.getEnd(),options);
00878 }
00879 
00880 template<typename _CHROM_, typename _BASE_>
00881 uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_> uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_>::getDistinct(std::string chr, int start, int end,  OverlapType options)
00882 {
00883     typename NGSExpMap::iterator iterMap;
00884     uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_> returnExp;
00885     _CHROM_* tempChrom=&(ExpMap[chr]);
00886 
00887     returnExp.combine(tempChrom->second.getDistinct(chr, start, end) );
00888     return returnExp;
00889 }

00899 template<typename _CHROM_, typename _BASE_>
00900 void uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_>::combine(const _CHROM_ & inputChrom)
00901 {
00902     //TODO remove const ref to allow move semantics?
00903     _CHROM_* currentChrom;
00904     std::vector<_BASE_> vecData;
00905 
00906     currentChrom=&(ExpMap[inputChrom.getChr()]);
00907     for(auto itChrom =inputChrom.begin(); itChrom!= inputChrom.end(); itChrom++){
00908         currentChrom->addSite(*itChrom);
00909     }
00910 }

00920 template<typename _CHROM_, typename _BASE_>
00921 template<typename _CHROMPAR_, typename _BASEPAR_>
00922 uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_> uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_>::getOverlapping(uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROMPAR_,_BASEPAR_> &compareExp, OverlapType type)
00923 {
00924     typename NGSExpMap::iterator iterMap;
00925     _CHROM_* pChrom;
00926     uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_> returnExp;
00927     for (iterMap = ExpMap.begin(); iterMap != ExpMap.end(); iterMap++)
00928     {
00929         pChrom = compareExp.getpChrom(iterMap->first);
00930         returnExp.combine(iterMap->second.getOverlapping(*pChrom));
00931     }
00932     return returnExp;
00933 }
00934 
00935 template<typename _CHROM_, typename _BASE_>
00936 template<typename _BASEPAR_>
00944  uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_> uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_>::getOverlapping(uGenericNGSChrom<_BASEPAR_> &compareChrom, OverlapType type)
00945 {
00946     try{
00947     uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_> tempExp;
00948 
00949     tempExp.combine(compareChrom);
00950     return getOverlapping(tempExp,type);
00951     }
00952     catch(std::exception & e)
00953     {
00954         throw e;
00955     }
00956 }
00958 template<typename _CHROM_, typename _BASE_>
00959 uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_> uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_>::getOverlapping(std::string chr, int start, int end, OverlapType type)
00960 {
00961     try {
00962     uGenericNGSChrom<_BASE_> tempChrom;
00963 
00964     auto item= uGenericNGS(chr,start,end);
00965     auto castItem= static_cast<_BASE_>(item);
00966     tempChrom.addSite(castItem);
00967     return getOverlapping(tempChrom, type);
00968     }
00969     catch(std::exception & e){
00970         throw e;
00971     }
00972 }

00983 template<typename _CHROM_, typename _BASE_>
00984 void uGenericNGSExperiment<_CHROM_,_BASE_>::divideItemsIntoNBins(int N, SplitType type)
00985 {
00986     try
00987     {
00988 for( auto& x : ExpMap)
00989         {
00990             x.second.divideItemsIntoNBins(N,type);
00991         }
00992     }
00993     catch(uChrom_operation_throw &e)
00994     {
00995         #ifdef DEBUG
00996         std::cerr << "Failed in divideItemsIntoNBins"<<std::endl;
00997         #endif
00998         throw uExp_operation_throw()<<string_error("Throwing while trying to call divideItemsIntoNBins() on all chroms");
00999     }
01000 }

01019     }
01020     catch(uChrom_operation_throw &e)

01024         #endif
01025         throw uExp_operation_throw()<<string_error("Throwing while trying to call divideItemsIntoBinofSize() on all chroms");
01026     }
